endPoints.description: Get a list of all users.
Create new user. Takes in a JSON body

queryParameters.name: email
queryParameters.type: string: email format, max len 40, required, must end with @uw.edu
queryParameters.description: The email of the user to be deleted.

example.description: The email address of the new user.

queryParameters.name: role
queryParameters.description: role of the user (admin | professor | facilitator | student | dev)

example.description: The role of the user. Must be one of the following: admin, professor, facilitator, student, dev.
The first name of the user. Maximum length is 25 characters.
The last name of the user. Maximum length is 25 characters.

response.description: A message indicating the result of the user creation operation.

example.description: A message indicating the result of the user creation operation.

endPoints.description: Must be an email of an active user. Will not truly delete the user, just disables them.

queryParameters.name: email
queryParameters.type: string: email format, max len 40, required, must end with @uw.edu
queryParameters.description: The email of the user to be deleted.

response.description: A message indicating the result of the deletion operation.

attributes.name: firstName
attributes.description: The first name of the user. : required, max len 25

attributes.name: lastName
attributes.description: The last name of the user. : required, max len 25

attributes.name: email
attributes.type: string: email format, max len 40, required, must end with @uw.edu

attributes.name: role
attributes.description: The role of the user. Gives different permissions. Enum of admin | professor | facilitator | student | dev. This field is required.

attributes.name: createdAt
attributes.description: The date and time when the user was created.

attributes.name: isActive
attributes.description: Indicates whether the user is active or inactive.

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: The date and time when the user was last updated.
